moduleName: GitHub / Orgs / PAT Grant Request / List Repositories
description:
Lists the repositories a fine-grained personal access token request is requesting access to.

Only GitHub Apps can use this endpoint.

schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.
Unique identifier of the request for access via fine-grained personal access token.
The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."
